classes.name: Table
classes.note: This class implements an exchange table according to OASIS Technical Resolution TR 9503:1995. http://www.oasis-open.org/specs/a503.htm

colsep.note: Indicates if by default a line should be drawn between the this table.

float.note: Indicate whether it is allowed to break the element.

frame.note: Used to defined the frame line around a table. 535 Document ID 202: AUTOSAR_FO_TPS_GenericStructureTemplate Template R23-11

helpEntry.note: This specifies an entry point in an online help system to with the parent class. The syntax shall be the applied help system respectively help

orient.note: Indicate whether a table should be represented as portrait. : landscape : portrait

pgwide.note: Used to indicate whether the figure should take the width (value = "pgwide") or not (value =

rowsep.note: Indicates if by default a line should be drawn at the table rows.

tableCaption.note: This element specifies the table heading.

tabstyle.note: Indicates an external table style. Tgroup 1..* aggr A table can be built of individual segments. Such a called tgroup.

classes.name: Tgroup
classes.note: This meta-class represents the ability to denote a table section.

align.note: Specifies how the cell entries shall be horizontally aligned specified TGROUP. Default is "LEFT"

cols.note: This attribute represents the number of columns in the

colsep.note: Indicates if by default a line shall be drawn between the this table group.

colspec.note: This specifies one particular column specification in the There shall be one entry for each column.

rowsep.note: Indicates if by default a line shall be drawn at the bottom rows in this table group.

tbody.note: This is the main part of the table segment, called the table 535 Document ID 202: AUTOSAR_FO_TPS_GenericStructureTemplate Template R23-11

tfoot.note: This represents the footer of the table segment. This printed at the end of the table or before a

thead.note: This represents the heading of the table section. The usually repeated at the beginning of each new

classes.name: Tbody
classes.note: This meta-class represents a part within a table group. Such a part can be the table head, the table body or the table foot.

valign.note: Indicates how the cells in the rows shall be aligned. inherited from tbody, otherwise it is "TOP"

classes.name: Row
classes.note: This meta-class represents the ability to express one row in a table.

rowsep.note: Indicates if by default a line should be displayed below the

valign.note: Indicates how the cells in the rows shall be aligned. inherited from tbody, otherwise it is "TOP"

classes.name: Entry
classes.note: This represents one particular table cell.

align.note: Specifies how the cell ENTRY shall be horizontally is "LEFT"

bgcolor.note: This allows to recommend a background color of the is specified bases on 6 digits RGB hex-code. 535 Document ID 202: AUTOSAR_FO_TPS_GenericStructureTemplate Template R23-11

colname.note: Indicate the name of the column, where the entry should

colsep.note: Indicates whether a line should be displayed end of this

entryContents.note: This is the content of the TableEntry

morerows.note: Number of additional rows. Default is "0"

nameend.note: When an entry spans multiple column this is the name of column.

namest.note: When an entry spans multiple column this is the name of column.

rotate.note: Indicates if the cellcontent shall be rotated. Default is 0; 1 the contents 90 degree counterclockwise. is defined by OASIS.

rowsep.note: Indicates whether a line should be displayed at the of the cell.

spanname.note: Capture the name of entry merging multiple columns.

valign.note: Indicates how the content of the cell shall be aligned. inherited from row or tbody, otherwise "TOP"

classes.name: Colspec
classes.note: This meta-class represents the ability to specify the properties of a column in a table.

align.note: Specifies how the cell entries shall be horizontally aligned specified column. Default is "LEFT"

colname.note: Specifies the name of the column.

colnum.note: column number (allows to sort the columns).

colsep.note: Indicates whether a line should be displayed right of this the column specification. 535 Document ID 202: AUTOSAR_FO_TPS_GenericStructureTemplate Template R23-11

colwidth.note: Width of the column. You can enter absolute values such cm, or relative values marked with * (e.g., 2* for double those of other columns with 1*). can be added to the number in the string. are: cm, mm, px, pt.

rowsep.note: Indicates whether a line should be displayed at the bottom the cells of the column defined in the Colspec.
